page.title: 18CLUBS IN SOUTHWATER
page.content: THE{CRICKET CLUB}IS THE OLDEST CLUB IN SOUTHWATER.THE CLUB HOUSE WAS BUILT IN 1952 BY SIR JOHN AUBREY FLETCHER,BUT IT HAS NOW BEEN KNOCKED DOWN AND IS BEING REBUILT.THE CLUBS WHICH MEET TWICE A WEEK ARE{ICHTHUS {YOUTH CLUB,BINGO CLUB,AND THE BRIDGE {CLUB.}THESE MEET IN THE PARISH ROOMS THE{SPORTS CLUB}HAS THE LARGEST MEMBERSHIP.SOME CLUBS ARE GETTING SO BIG DUE TO THE SOUTHWATER DEVELOPMENTS THAT THE CLUBS WILL DIVIDE UP.MOST CLUBS MEET IN THE VILLAGE HALL.PEOPLE WOULD LIKE A SQUASH AND BOWLING CLUB. FROM OUR SURVEY WE FOUND 15 CLUBS THAT INVOLVED CHILDREN AND 13 CLUBS FOR ADULTS IN THE VILLAGE.
